title: Children of the World Unite

tokens.lyric: Together we must change the wrong from right.

lines.raw: [A7]Together we must change the wrong from right.

tokens.lyric: We must learn to live quite happily beside our fellow man.

lines.raw: [D]We must learn to live quite happily beside our fellow man.

tokens.lyric: Lay down you sword, take up the pen –

lines.raw: [G]Lay down you sword, take up the pen –

tokens.lyric: And the world will join us in our peaceful fight;

lines.raw: [A7]And the world will join us in our peaceful fight;

tokens.lyric: The future may depend upon our might.

lines.raw: [D]The future may depend upon our might.

tokens.lyric: And if God will only grant the strength to turn the other cheek,

lines.raw: [A7]And if God will only grant the strength to turn the other cheek,

tokens.lyric: To show the non-believers just how blessed are the meek;

lines.raw: [D]To show the non-believers just how blessed are the meek;

tokens.lyric: We'll see yellow, black and red in hand with white

lines.raw: [G]We'll see yellow, black and red in hand with white
